00040 #ifndef CALLBACKMANAGER_CPP

00049 using namespace std;

00051 namespace phys
00052 {
00053     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00054     // CallBackManager Constructor
00055     ///////////////////////////////////////
00056     CallBackManager::CallBackManager(World* _Parent)
00057     {
00058         TheWorldIListenTo = _Parent;
00059 
00060         PreInputCallback = NULL;
00061         PostInputCallback = NULL;
00062 
00063         PrePhysicsCallback = NULL;
00064         PostPhysicsCallback = NULL;
00065 
00066         PreRenderCallback = NULL;
00067         PostRenderCallback = NULL;
00068     }
00069 
00070     CallBackManager::~CallBackManager()
00071     {
00072 
00073     }
00074 
00075     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00076     //Preinput callback will be called in the main loop first
00077     ///////////////////////////////////////
00078     bool CallBackManager::PreInput()
00079     {
00080         //If a call back has been set then we use it, otherwise we can
00081         //assume that we should just keep execute the main loop
00082         if(NULL!=PreInputCallback)
00083         {
00084             return (*PreInputCallback)();
00085         }
00086         return true;
00087     }
00088 
00089     void CallBackManager::ErasePreInput()
00090     {
00091         this->PreInputCallback = NULL;
00092     }
00093 
00094     void CallBackManager::SetPreInput(bool (*Callback)())
00095     {
00096         this->PreInputCallback = Callback;
00097     }
00098 
00099     bool CallBackManager::IsPreInputCallbackSet()
00100     {
00101         if(NULL==PreInputCallback)
00102         {
00103             return false;
00104         }
00105         return true;
00106     }
00107 
00108     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00109     //Postinput callback will be called in the main loop right after input
00110     ///////////////////////////////////////
00111     bool CallBackManager::PostInput()
00112     {
00113         //If a call back has been set then we use it, otherwise we can
00114         //assume that we should just keep execute the main loop
00115         if(NULL!=PostInputCallback)
00116         {
00117             return (*PostInputCallback)();
00118         }
00119         return true;
00120     }
00121 
00122     void CallBackManager::ErasePostInput()
00123     {
00124         this->PostInputCallback = NULL;
00125     }
00126 
00127     void CallBackManager::SetPostInput(bool (*Callback)())
00128     {
00129         this->PostInputCallback = Callback;
00130     }
00131 
00132     bool CallBackManager::IsPostInputCallbackSet()
00133     {
00134         if(NULL==PostInputCallback)
00135         {
00136             return false;
00137         }
00138         return true;
00139     }
